Price: ~$12-15

Decorative square cushion case. Pack of 2 patio pillows for couch, tent, sunbrella. Bright yellow color. Covers only.

Price: ~$35-40

Price: ~$18-22

Cute gingerbread-shaped pillows. Christmas decorative pillow for couch, living room, bed. Festive holiday décor.

37. wioyoi Valentines Day Outdoor Pillow Covers (Set of 4)

Price: ~$18-22

Sports & Themed Pillows

38. Plush Soccer Pillow - Round Ball (15.7 Inch)

Price: ~$20-25

Heart & Valentine Pillows

Price: ~$20-25

40. HongMall Cute Plush Red Heart Pillow (11.8 X 11 Inch)

Price: ~$15-18

Key Features to Consider:

  • Size: Standard 18x18” for couches; 12x20” lumbar for back support; oversized for floor seating
  • Fill: Down alternative (hypoallergenic), memory foam (support), polyester (budget-friendly)
  • Cover Material: Cotton (breathable), velvet (luxury), outdoor fabric (weather-resistant)
  • Insert vs. Cover: Inserts are complete pillows; covers allow customization and easy washing
  • Outdoor Use: Look for waterproof, UV-resistant, and mildew-resistant fabrics
  • Care: Most inserts are machine washable; covers often have zippers for easy removal

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Durable stainless steel scissors. Soft grip comfort handle. Includes protective sheath. Dishwasher safe. Black color, 8.72-inch length.

Premium heat resistant smasher for ground beef. Nylon potato mix tool. Meat and poultry tenderizer. Black color. Essential for cooking ground meat.

Price: ~$18-22

25. Alpha Grillers Meat Thermometer Digital

Price: ~$15-18

Instant read food thermometer for cooking and grilling. Great gift for men. Valentine’s Day and general occasions. Accurate temperature readings.

Stainless Steel Utensil Sets

26. Stainless Steel Cooking Utensils Set (7PCS)

Price: ~$25-30

Heat resistant handle utensils. Includes ladle, meat fork, slotted spatula, pasta fork, masher, solid spoon, and skimmer spoon. Professional kitchen tools.

27. Berglander 13 Pieces Stainless Steel Cooking Utensils

Price: ~$30-35

Kitchen tools set with utensil holder. Non-stick and heat resistant. Dishwasher safe, easy to clean. Complete 13-pack professional set.

28. 4 Pcs Cooking Utensils Set - Stainless Steel

Price: ~$18-22

Heat resistant metal kitchen tools. Includes solid and slotted turner, wok spatula, and serving spoon. Ergonomic handle, easy to clean. Silver color.

Specialty Silicone Tools

29. Pack of 2 Silicone Solid Turner

Price: ~$10-12

Non-stick slotted kitchen spatulas. High heat resistant, BPA-free. Ideal for fish, eggs, and pancakes. Black color, essential cooking utensils.

30. STAUB Multifunction Spatula Spoon

Price: ~$15-18

Great for both cooking and serving. Durable BPA-free matte black silicone. Acacia wood handle. Safe for nonstick cooking surfaces. Premium quality.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Heat Resistance: Look for 446°F-600°F rating for silicone utensils
  • Material: Silicone (non-stick safe), wood (natural, gentle), stainless steel (durable)
  • BPA-Free: Essential for food-grade silicone products
  • Dishwasher Safe: Most silicone and stainless steel options are dishwasher safe
  • Set vs. Individual: Sets offer better value; buy individual pieces for specific needs
  • Handle Design: Wooden handles stay cool; stainless can get hot

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

Key Features to Consider:

  • Business Envelopes: Security tinting provides privacy; peel & seal is more convenient than gummed

  • Chinese New Year: 2026 is Year of the Horse; traditional red color symbolizes good luck
  • Bulk vs. Small Packs: Bulk (500+) offers better value; smaller packs (50-100) for occasional use
  • Poly Mailers: Waterproof and tear-resistant; perfect for e-commerce shipping
  • Budget Envelopes: Cash envelope systems help with financial planning and saving challenges

All prices are approximate and may vary based on sales and availability.

entry.title: Best Selling Candles

entry.title: Best Selling Snow Shovels
entry.content:
Best Selling Snow Shovels on Amazon

Manual/Traditional Shovels:

  1. True Temper 18” Ergonomic Mountain Mover Snow Shovel - ~$30-40 Versatile hybrid design with curved ergonomic handle that reduces back strain by 15%. Features an 18-inch poly blade with steel wear strip, perfect for both shoveling and pushing snow on driveways and sidewalks.

  2. Snow Joe Shovelution Spring-Assisted Snow Shovel (18”) - ~$35-45 Innovative dual-handle design with spring-assist technology that reduces back strain by up to 30%. Weighs only 3.5 lbs and uses upper body muscles for lifting leverage.

  3. Snow Joe Shovelution 20” Wide Blade Version - ~$40-50 Larger 20-inch blade version with the same spring-loaded handle system. Ideal for pushing lighter snow across larger areas while maintaining ergonomic benefits.

  4. Emsco Group Bigfoot 18” Combination Snow Shovel - ~$25-35 Multi-purpose 3-in-1 design made in USA. Lightweight poly blade functions as a standard shovel, scoop, and pusher. Features steel-core handle and bright orange color for visibility.

  5. True Temper Aluminum Snow Shovel (18”) - ~$30 Traditional design with aluminum blade and steel handle. Lightweight yet durable, perfect for light to moderate snowfall. No assembly required.

Electric/Cordless Shovels:

  1. Greenworks 80V 12” Cordless Snow Shovel - ~$235-250 Powerful 80V brushless motor clears 12-inch wide path. Includes 2.0Ah battery with 45-minute runtime. Lightweight design with adjustable chute throws snow up to 20 feet.

  2. Snow Joe 24V Cordless Electric Shovel - ~$150-170 Budget-friendly electric option with 13-inch clearing width. Handles up to 6 inches of snow and throws it up to 20 feet. Includes 24V battery, charger, and scraper blade.

  3. Tolsprint 20V Cordless Electric Snow Shovel - ~$100-130 Compact 12-inch electric shovel with 16-foot throwing distance. Includes 4Ah battery and quick charger. Good for decks, patios, and sidewalks.

All prices are approximate and may vary. Electric shovels are ideal for those who want to avoid manual labor, while traditional shovels remain the most affordable and reliable option for most homeowners.

entry.title: Best Selling Fruit Bowls
entry.content:
Best-Selling Fruit Bowls on Amazon

  1. Sevenblue 2 Tier Large Fruit Basket (#1 Best Seller) - ~$16-$20

    • 2-tier design with 2 mobile banana hangers
    • Metal construction with wooden handle
    • 4K+ bought in past month

  2. Auledio Iron 2-Tier Countertop Fruit Basket - ~$18-$22

    • Includes banana hanger
    • Black finish
    • 64 ounces capacity

  3. Livabber Fruit Basket Bowl with Banana Hanger - ~$20-$25

    • 3-tier metal base
    • Detachable organizer
    • Black color

  4. LIBKEN Metal Fruit Bowl with Mesh Lid - ~$22-$28

    • Includes mesh lid and basket
    • Black countertop organizer

  5. HOMKULA Ceramic Fruit Bowl (3-Tier) - ~$25-$30

    • Ceramic with metal stand
    • Gold finish, small size
    • 3K+ bought in past month

  6. Sakugi Fruit Basket (2-Tier) - ~$18-$23

    • Detachable with banana hanger
    • Wooden handle
    • Black, 8.5” D x 12.4” W x 12.3” H

  7. GILLAS 2 Tier Countertop Fruit Basket - ~$19-$24

    • 2 banana hangers
    • Rectangular storage stand
    • Wooden handle, large capacity

  8. Simple Trending Round Metal Fruit Basket - ~$15-$20

    • Rust-proof, non-slip, breathable
    • Black, 11” diameter x 3.2” H
    • 800+ bought in past monthA good fruit bowl is more than just a decorative centerpiece; it’s actually a small-scale engineering project designed to fight the inevitable march of rot.

Fruit Bowl Buying Tips

To keep your produce fresh and your kitchen looking sharp, here are the essential features to look for:

1. Airflow is Everything

This is the most critical technical feature. Fruits like bananas and apples release ethylene gas, which accelerates ripening (and eventually rotting).

  • The Fix: Look for a bowl with a perforated, wire mesh, or open-slat design.

  • Why: Good circulation allows ethylene gas to escape and prevents moisture buildup at the bottom, which is the primary cause of mold.

2. Material Matters

The material of the bowl affects temperature and hygiene:

  • Metal/Wire: Best for airflow and keeping fruit cool.

  • Ceramic/Glass: Beautiful and easy to clean, but they trap heat and gas unless they have holes.

  • Wood: Naturally breathable and looks great, but porous wood can absorb juices if a fruit over-ripens, leading to bacteria growth.

3. Surface Texture and Shape

Fruit is delicate. A bowl that is too “aggressive” will ruin your harvest.

  • Smooth Interiors: Ensure there are no sharp edges or rough welds on wire bowls that could puncture the skin of a peach or pear.

  • Broad Base: A wide, shallow bowl is superior to a deep, narrow one.

  • The “Bruise Factor”: In a deep bowl, the weight of the top fruit crushes the ones at the bottom. A shallow bowl allows you to spread the fruit out in a single or double layer.

4. The Banana Hanger

If you’re a fan of bananas, a bowl with an integrated banana hook is a game-changer.

  • The Benefit: Hanging bananas mimics how they grow on a tree, preventing “resting bruises” and keeping them away from other fruits that you might not want to ripen quite so fast.

Summary Checklist

Feature Why it matters
Breathability Prevents ethylene gas buildup and mold.
Visibility If you can see the fruit, you’re more likely to eat it before it spoils.
Size Must be large enough so fruit isn’t “suffocating” in layers.
Ease of Cleaning Fruit attracts fruit flies; the bowl needs to be easily washable.

Pro Tip: Keep your “gas-producers” (apples, avocados, bananas) separate from your “sensitive” items (leafy greens or berries) if you aren’t ready for them to ripen yet!

Shop Fruit Bowls on Amazon

entry.title: Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee Review
entry.content:
For the price I paid for these headphones, these really are great and I am listening to them right now as I write this

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee headphones are, for many, the gateway drug into the world of high-fidelity audio. Offered exclusively through Drop (formerly Massdrop), these open-back headphones are known for their exceptional value and balanced sound signature. But do they live up to the hype? Let’s dive in.

Amazon.com: Sennheiser HD 560 S Over-The-Ear Audiophile Headphones - Neutral Frequency Response, E.A.R. Technology for Wide Sound Field, Open-Back Earcups, Detachable Cable, (Black) (HD 560S)

Build Quality & Comfort:

The HD 58X Jubilee shares a similar design and construction to the classic HD 600 series, but with a slightly more budget-conscious approach. The plastic used feels sturdy enough, though not as premium as some of Sennheiser’s more expensive offerings. The detachable cable is a welcome addition, allowing for easy replacement or upgrade down the line.

Comfort is where the 58X really shines. The velour earcups are plush and breathable, making them comfortable for long listening sessions. The headband provides adequate clamping force, ensuring a secure fit without feeling overly tight. While the open-back design does leak sound, making them unsuitable for quiet environments like libraries, it also contributes to the spacious soundstage.

Sound Quality:

The sonic signature of the HD 58X Jubilee is arguably its strongest selling point. It’s remarkably balanced, with a slight emphasis on the midrange, which makes vocals and instruments sound clear and present. Bass response is tight and controlled, without being overly boomy. The treble is smooth and detailed, avoiding harshness or sibilance.

Compared to other headphones in its price range (often around $150-200 USD), the HD 58X Jubilee offers exceptional clarity and detail retrieval. The open-back design creates a wide soundstage, allowing instruments to breathe and providing a more immersive listening experience. While not the most analytical headphones, the 58X Jubilee provides a very pleasant and engaging listening experience for a variety of genres.

Pros:

  • Excellent Value: For the price, the sound quality is unmatched.
  • Balanced Sound Signature: Suitable for a wide range of music genres.
  • Comfortable: Velour earcups and well-padded headband make for long listening sessions.
  • Detachable Cable: Allows for easy replacement or upgrade.
  • Open-Back Design: Provides a wide and immersive soundstage.

Cons:

  • Build Quality: Plastic construction feels slightly budget-conscious.
  • Open-Back Design: Not suitable for quiet environments due to sound leakage.
  • Requires Amplification: While they can be driven by a smartphone, they benefit from a dedicated headphone amplifier.

Who are these headphones for?

Amazon.com: Sennheiser HD 505 - Wired Headphones Over Ear with Transparent Sound and Controlled Bass, Enhanced Comfort Studio Headphones for Music, Work, Gaming, Audiophiles, Students, Traveling, Copper Edition

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee is perfect for:

  • Budget-conscious audiophiles: Looking for an entry point into high-fidelity audio.
  • Music lovers: Who appreciate a balanced and detailed sound signature.
  • Home listeners: Who don’t need to worry about sound leakage.

Conclusion:

The Sennheiser HD 58X Jubilee is a fantastic pair of headphones that offers exceptional value for money. While the build quality may not be the most premium, the comfort and sound quality more than make up for it. If you’re looking for a great-sounding pair of open-back headphones without breaking the bank, the HD 58X Jubilee is an excellent choice. Highly Recommended.

Shop Headphones on Amazon

entry.title: Floor Steamer
entry.content:
She sighed. Photo by PAN XIAOZHEN on Unsplash

She wished she could afford a house cleaner, but like everything in 2025 everything got so expensive. “It’s the economy”, the excuses said but it was something else

Amazon.com: Bissell Power Fresh Steam Mop with Natural Sanitization, Floor Steamer, Tile Cleaner, and Hard Wood Floor Cleaner with Flip-Down Easy Scrubber, 1940A : Everything Else

Her bad decisions. She didn’t go to college when all her friends did. She bought a car and got a good factory job. “Not everyone needs to go to college”, she told herself.

And for a while, she was right. She had the house and the fancy truck and all the trappings of the upper middle class. Her boots - her boots even screamed “I’ve made it”

Then the layoff notices came. Restructuring, they said.

The truck went first. She missed it, but it was a toy and there were other options including public transit. “It’s not that bad”, she lied to herself.

Amazon.com - Dupray Neat Steam Cleaner with 40-Piece Accessory Kit, Powerful, chemical-free cleaning for floors, cars, tiles, grout, and more. *Kills 99.9% of Bacteria & Viruses

Her friends were still there - the college-going friends. The ones that had “careers” and not just well paying jobs. But they didn’t have what she had - determination.

She sold some belongings on eBay and Craigslist and scraped up enough to buy a mop and broom and other cleaning supplies. For the first few jobs, this will have to do - and they did. She cleaned well and she cleaned fast and those 2 traits got her more and more referrals until one day she realized she didn’t want the house cleaner as she was the cleaner and she was fine with that.

The economy may still be bad, but she was doing great.

Shop Floor Steam Cleaners on Amazon

entry.title: 8x10 Photo Frames
entry.content:
He stared at the plain empty frame, and cried.

Photo by Angèle Kamp on Unsplash

The photo of his wife used to occupy the space but he couldn’t bear to look at it now that she was gone.

He was fully aware that one is not supposed to remove photos of loved ones when they passed, but for now the pain was too sharp and piercing.

Amazon.com - upsimples 8x10 Picture Frame Set of 5, Display Pictures 5x7 with Mat or 8 x 10 Without, Wall Gallery Photo Frames, Black

He fell for her hard on the first day she met, her brown hair fell to her shoulders and when she tucked it behind her ears he knew.

She didn’t know at first. He was a friend and somebody to out with from time to time. Little did she know that he wanted her and to be with her forever.

As time passed, the shared movies became more like dates and although he wasn’t considered a catch in the looks department he was kind, and kind is what she needed.

Amazon.com - upsimples 11x14 Picture Frame, Display Pictures 8x10 with Mat or 11x14 Without Mat, Wall Hanging Photo Frame, Black, 1 Pack

They had been married 40 years when she died. Cancer, as always. It was slow and horrific as one can imagine but eventually it was just too much and she passed with the winter snow.

The friends and family came and brought lasagna and told him they were sorry for his loss and although they meant well once they were gone the loss was still there and all the well wishes didn’t make a dent.

Perhaps one day the photo would go back into the frame but for now it was empty, just like his heart.

Shop Photo Frames on Amazon.

This blue coffee mug had a good hand feel in the hand and seems to work well for me for using every day. They are sturdy and are dishwasher safe which is nice too because nobody wants to wash dishes by hand with a [[2025-12-02-kitchen-sponge.md|kitchen sponge]] because that’s no fun.

entry.title: These are the Best Dish Cloths
entry.content:
I used to just use the good old j-cloths that I had been using since oh, the eighties at least.

Photo by Brooke Lark on Unsplash

But now, I have better. Because there’s now some cloths that work better than the old dish washing cloths of yesterday.

The problem with the older dish washing cloths of yesterday is that they smelled a lot if you didn’t stay on top of them. The musty smell is one smell I could never get used to, and besides - who wants to wash dishes with an older musty dish cloth that’s a germ factory in fabric farm.

Jim’s Pick

I really like these because they’re sturdy but no too big so you’re not tied up in the cloth while you’re trying to get some dishes washed

Amazon.com: Kitinjoy 100% Cotton Kitchen Dish Cloths, 6 Pack Waffle Weave Ultra Soft Absorbent Dish Towels for Drying Dishes Quick Drying Kitchen Towels Dish Rags, 12 X 12 Inches, Dark Grey : Home & Kitchen

these are great for washing my travel mug for one example as they are very absorbant to get all the old coffee out and have it rinsed and ready for next time.

Here’s a few other dish cloths I like:

entry.title: Men's Levi Jeans
entry.content:
Jeans are the quintessential wardrobe item for myself. I have tried to wear many other pants over the years and always come back to jeans.

Jim’s pick for Mens Levi’s Jeans Levi’s Men’s 511 Slim Fit Jeans

Photo by Mnz on Unsplash

Now, especially because now they’re not just plain denim but also some kind of space age stretchy material for those of us with variable waistlines.

I stick to the basic colors and for style, I like the slim fit for my once slim fit, but if I keep eating pie I might have to graduate to relaxed

I suggest waiting for them to go on sale as they tend to frequently because who wants to pay full price for a pair of jeans?

entry.title: Travel Mug.md
entry.content:
Photo by Julian Hochgesang on Unsplash You would think with all this technology available to is we would be able to design a coffee mug that doesn’t spill. I didn’t know I was a coffee cup snob until I was constantly spilling on myself and so I went and did some reading and found that the Contigo cups were pretty good.

I like the fact that you can flip a tab and the opening will close quickly as you don’t have to worry about spilling. I would and definitely have recommend this coffee travel mug.

entry.title: Men's Wallets
entry.content:
Oh, wallets. I’ve had a few in my lifetime but they’ve never seemed to be the one. I had a velcro wallet one once and that was great until you opened it and realized that people were staring.

[!Jim’s Pick] Jim’s Pick - This is the wallet I would buy if I had to do it all over again Amazon.com: Vaultskin MOORGATE Slim Card Holder – Minimalist Leather Wallet with RFID Blocking, Front Pocket Credit Card Case for Men & Women (Royal Blue) : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

I always, always wore my wallet that had every receipt in it from 1985 becausse, you never know when you might need it again.

But then I found out about minimalist wallet. I’m no minimalist as [[We Have That At Home!| this site]] will show over time but man it’s nice to get this thing into your front pocket instead of the back because it’s a lot easier on the back and you don’t have take your wallet out after driving for 40 minutes because you can’t feel your ass anymore.

If my pick doesn’t do it for you there’s a few other wallets that might work and are still minimal:

Amazon.com: The Ridge Wallet - Slim Minimalist Compact Wallet and Card Holder, | RFID Protected Front Pocket Wallets | Integrated Cash Strap | Forest Green : Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry

entry.title: Mens Puffer Coat.md
entry.content:
I really don’t care much for what winter coat I have as my current lifestyle is to go from house to car most days and maybe have to stand around and wait for the school bus with my daughter in the am.

I have the Amazon essentials puffer jacket and one of the better features of this jacket is that it is cheap and is often on sale for $20 or so which in 2025 is a great price for a jacket of any kind.

[!NOTE] Jim’s Pick for a lightweight puffer jacket Amazon.com: Amazon Essentials Men’s Packable Lightweight Water-Resistant Puffer Jacket (Available in Big & Tall), Navy, Large : Sports & Outdoors

There’s other jackets you could buy and some are from brands you recognize and then some are from brands you don’t but they are all the same fairly well so just pick one. I like the Amazon one I list above, but if that’s not your bag, then there’s others to choose from.

entry.title: Kid's Skechers Shoes
entry.content:
Jim’s Pick

Skechers Girls Eternal Heart Lights

But, the kiddo loves them more than her sea monkeys so there’s that.

I must warn you that if you’re buying these for your child that they will be clean for all of about 7 seconds. But the good news is that they seem to be washable for the most part and the lights still work after.

Maybe I got lucky with the washing, I dunno but you only get a few month out of these anyway and you can usually find them on sale for about $25 so whatever.

These are great shoes because the child can put them on themselves due to the elastic laces and velcro. I recommend these.

There are other designs and colors if you don’t like my pick, but the skechers are a good brand name sneaker for little growing feet.

Shop Skechers Shoes for Girls on Amazon

entry.title: Trivets for the Table
entry.content:
I like Trivets, I do.

I didn’t know what a trivet was until my late 40’s but now we have them everywhere and they are used almost every day.

What’s a trivet? It’s a thing that allows you to put something hot from the stove and not burn the thing underneath. We use it to serve family style sometimes when we are [[2025-12-03-glass-pen-holder.md| glass pen holder]] lazy.

Jim’s Pick

I’m not that fussy about trivets and so I Trivets just get some cork trivets like these and call it a day:

entry.title: Men's Hoodies
entry.content:
This is my favorite hoodie

I have fallen when it comes to fashion. At one time it was all about the look and now comfort trumps all and I live in a hoodie almost all the time now.

Photo by Mediamodifier on Unsplash

Jim’s Pick

If I had to pick one hoodie, it would be this one because, I would like to have no logo at all but I am the odd one and this is the best it gets then it’s this one:

adidas Men’s Essentials Fleece Hoodie, Shadow Brown, Small at Amazon Men’s Clothing store

All you really need is a clean hoodie a white t-shirt underneath and some comfortable shoes and you’re ready to go.

I’m kind of allergic to logos, but the Adidas stuff is well made for the most part so that’s why I would buy this one over others, but there’s a few other options to consider when buying the best hooded sweatshirt for your wardrobe
